list.name: Start marker
list.query: select text,generatorHost,application,title FROM (select text from events where $timeFilter and "text" =~ /.*started$/ GROUP BY generatorHost,application,title)

list.name: Stop marker
list.query: select "text", "generatorHost", "application" FROM (select text from events where $timeFilter and "text" =~ /.*ended$/ GROUP BY  "generatorHost", "application")

description:
Monitor your Apache JMeter load test in real time with InfluxDB and Grafana.
Get overall summary, errors details and particular transaction response times.

targets.query: select "application", "testId", "title", time as "start" from (select first(text), time from "events" where time > now()-190d group by "application", "testId", "title")
select "testId", time as "stop" from (select last(text), time from "events" where time > now()-190d group by "application", "testId", "title")

SELECT 
    max("TPS") as "TPS (max)",
    mean("TPS") as "TPS (mean)",
    max("Mean Time") as "Time (max)",
    mean("Mean Time") as "Time (mean)",
    max("90% Time") as "90% (max)",
    mean("90% Time") as "90% (mean)"
FROM (
        SELECT  
	    sum("count") / ${step} AS "TPS", 
            mean("avg") AS "Mean Time", 
            max("pct90.0") AS "90% Time"
        FROM ${measurement_name} 
        WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "transaction" =~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/  AND "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "generatorHost" =~ /^${generator:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter 
        GROUP BY time(${step}s), "transaction"
)
WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"
SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("AT") as "sum" FROM
(SELECT mean("meanAT") as "AT" FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "generatorHost" fill(null))
GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT sum("AT") as "sum" FROM
(SELECT mean("meanAT") as "AT" FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "generatorHost" fill(null))
GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT max("KO")/ max("TOTAL") as "KO%" FROM
(SELECT sum("count") / (${step}) AS "TOTAL" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/ AND "statut" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${step}s), "transaction" fill(0)),
(SELECT sum("count") / (${step}) AS "KO" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${step}s), "transaction" fill(0))
WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${step}s), "transaction" fill(0)

SELECT max("KO")/ max("TOTAL") as "(raw)" FROM
(SELECT moving_average(sum("count"), ${scope}) as "KO" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application" =~ /^${application}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${main_transaction}$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "transaction" fill(0)),
(SELECT moving_average(sum("count"), ${scope})  AS "TOTAL" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/ AND "statut" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  time($__interval), "transaction" fill(0))
WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY  time($__interval), "transaction" fill(0)

SELECT max("KO")/max("TOTAL") as "KO%" FROM
(SELECT sum("count")  AS "TOTAL" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/ AND "statut" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction" fill(0)),
(SELECT sum("count")  AS "KO" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction" fill(0))
WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction" fill(0)
SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("AT") as "sum" FROM
(SELECT mean("meanAT") as "AT" FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "generatorHost" fill(null))
GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT sum("AT") as "sum" FROM
(SELECT mean("meanAT") as "AT" FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "generatorHost" fill(null))
GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT sum("AT") as "sum" FROM
(SELECT mean("meanAT") as "AT" FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "generatorHost" fill(null))
GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("countError")  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("error") / sum("all") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("countError") AS "error" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"

panels.title: Error count (group by Response Code, Response Message)

targets.query: SELECT sum("count")  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("rb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT max("sb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT
first("OK") as "OK",
first("TPS max*") as "TPS max*",
first("TPS*") as "TPS*",
first("90% max*") as "90% max*",
first("90%*") as "90%*",
first("Time max*") as "Time max*",
first("Time*") as "Time*"
FROM(
SELECT 
sum("Count") AS "OK",
max("TPS") as "TPS max*",
mean("TPS") as "TPS*",
max("Mean Time") as "Time max*",
mean("Mean Time") as "Time*",
max("90% Time") as "90% max*",
mean("90% Time") as "90%*"
FROM (
SELECT  
sum("count") AS "Count",  
(sum("count") / ${step}) AS "TPS", 
(mean("avg")) AS "Mean Time", 
(max("pct90.0")) AS "90% Time"
FROM ${measurement_name} WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${transaction:regex}$/ AND "generatorHost" =~ /^${generator:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${step}s), "transaction"
) WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"
) WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1000h), "transaction"

SELECT 
sum("Count") AS "OK",
max("TPS") as "TPS (max)",
mean("TPS") as "TPS (mean)",
max("Mean Time") as "Time (max)",
mean("Mean Time") as "Time (mean)",
max("90% Time") as "90% (max)",
mean("90% Time") as "90% (mean)"
FROM (
SELECT  
sum("count") AS "Count",  
(sum("count") / ${step}) AS "TPS", 
(mean("avg")) AS "Mean Time", 
(max("pct90.0")) AS "90% Time"
FROM ${measurement_name} WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${transaction:regex}$/ AND "transaction" !~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/ AND "generatorHost" =~ /^${generator:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${step}s), "transaction"
) WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"

options.content: Усредненные метрики за интервал ${step} секунд

panels.description:
Максимальное значение 90% за интервал времени ${step} секунд:

1. Для интервала ${send_interval}s вычислились метрики 90% времени отклика
2. Для нескольких таких интервалов ${send_interval}s, которые вошли в общий интервал ${step}s выбирается максимальное значение метрики 90%
3. Метрика отображается на графике
panels.title: 90%: Времена отклика (средние)

targets.query:
SELECT sum("Total Time") as "Total Time" FROM (
SELECT sum("count")  * mean(avg) AS "Total Time" FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE ("application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${request:regex}$/ AND "generatorHost" =~ /^${generator:regex}$/ AND "statut" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s), "transaction")
GROUP BY time(1000h), "transaction"

SELECT
sum("Count") AS "OK",
max("TPS") as "TPS max*",
mean("TPS") as "TPS*",
max("Mean Time") as "Time max*",
mean("Mean Time") as "Time*",
max("90% Time") as "90% max*",
mean("90% Time") as "90%*"
FROM (
SELECT  
sum("count") AS "Count",  
(sum("count") / ${step}) AS "TPS", 
(mean("avg")) AS "Mean Time", 
(max("pct90.0")) AS "90% Time"
FROM ${measurement_name} WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${request:regex}$/ AND "generatorHost" =~ /^${generator:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${step}s), "transaction"
) WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1000h), "transaction"

SELECT
first("OK") as "OK",
first("TPS max*") as "TPS max*",
first("TPS*") as "TPS*",
first("90% max*") as "90% max*",
first("90%*") as "90%*",
first("Time max*") as "Time max*",
first("Time*") as "Time*"
FROM(
SELECT 
sum("Count") AS "OK",
max("TPS") as "TPS max*",
mean("TPS") as "TPS*",
max("Mean Time") as "Time max*",
mean("Mean Time") as "Time*",
max("90% Time") as "90% max*",
mean("90% Time") as "90%*"
FROM (
SELECT  
sum("count") AS "Count",  
(sum("count") / ${step}) AS "TPS", 
(mean("avg")) AS "Mean Time", 
(max("pct90.0")) AS "90% Time"
FROM ${measurement_name} WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${request:regex}$/ AND "generatorHost" =~ /^${generator:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${step}s), "transaction"
) WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"
) WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1000h), "transaction"

SELECT 
sum("Count") AS "OK",
max("TPS") as "TPS (max)",
mean("TPS") as "TPS (mean)",
max("Mean Time") as "Time (max)",
mean("Mean Time") as "Time (mean)",
max("90% Time") as "90% (max)",
mean("90% Time") as "90% (mean)"
FROM (
SELECT  
sum("count") AS "Count",  
(sum("count") / ${step}) AS "TPS", 
(mean("avg")) AS "Mean Time", 
(max("pct90.0")) AS "90% Time"
FROM ${measurement_name} WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${request:regex}$/ AND "generatorHost" =~ /^${generator:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${step}s), "transaction"
) WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"

options.content: Усредненные метрики за интервал ${step} секунд

panels.description:
Максимальное значение 90% за интервал времени ${step} секунд:

1. Для интервала ${send_interval}s вычислились метрики 90% времени отклика

panels.title: 90%: Времена отклика (средние)
Time: Суммарное время отклика (по успешным запросам)

targets.query:
SELECT 
sum("Count") AS "OK",
max("TPS") as "TPS (max)",
mean("TPS") as "TPS (mean)",
max("Mean Time") as "Time (max)",
mean("Mean Time") as "Time (mean)",
max("90% Time") as "90% (max)",
mean("90% Time") as "90% (mean)"
FROM (
SELECT  
sum("count") AS "Count",  
(sum("count") / ${step}) AS "TPS", 
(mean("avg")) AS "Mean Time", 
(max("pct90.0")) AS "90% Time"
FROM ${measurement_name} WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "transaction" =~ /^${transaction:regex}$/ AND "transaction" !~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^${group_filter:regex}.*$/ AND "generatorHost" =~ /^${generator:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${step}s), "transaction"
) WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"

options.content: Усредненные метрики за интервал ${step} секунд

panels.description:
Максимальное значение 90% за интервал времени ${step} секунд:

1. Для интервала ${send_interval}s вычислились метрики 90% времени отклика
2. Для нескольких таких интервалов ${send_interval}s, которые вошли в общий интервал ${step}s выбирается максимальное значение метрики 90%
3. Метрика отображается на графике
panels.title: 90%: Времена отклика (средние)

list.definition: select distinct("application") FROM (SELECT first("count") FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "application")
list.name: application
list.query: select distinct("application") FROM (SELECT first("count") FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "application")

list.definition: select distinct("transaction") FROM (SELECT first("count") FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE  "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/  AND "transaction"=~/^(А|Б|Г|Д|Е|Ё|Ж|З|Й|К|Л|М|Н|О|П|С|Т|У|Ф|Х|Ц|Ч|Ш|Щ|Ы|Э|Ю|Я|Р|В|И).+\(TC\)$/ OR "transaction"=~/^.+\(TG\)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction")
list.name: main_transaction
list.query: select distinct("transaction") FROM (SELECT first("count") FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE  "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/  AND "transaction"=~/^(А|Б|Г|Д|Е|Ё|Ж|З|Й|К|Л|М|Н|О|П|С|Т|У|Ф|Х|Ц|Ч|Ш|Щ|Ы|Э|Ю|Я|Р|В|И).+\(TC\)$/ OR "transaction"=~/^.+\(TG\)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction")

list.definition: select distinct("transaction") FROM (SELECT first("count") FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE  "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all' AND "transaction" !~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/ AND ("transaction" =~ /^.+\(TC\)$/ OR "transaction" =~ /^.+?SLA.*$/ OR "transaction" =~ /^.+?Запрос-выписки-за-день-всего.*$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction")
list.name: transaction
list.query: select distinct("transaction") FROM (SELECT first("count") FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE  "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all' AND "transaction" !~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/ AND ("transaction" =~ /^.+\(TC\)$/ OR "transaction" =~ /^.+?SLA.*$/ OR "transaction" =~ /^.+?Запрос-выписки-за-день-всего.*$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction")

list.definition: select distinct("transaction") FROM (SELECT first("count") FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE  "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all' AND "transaction" !~ /^.+\(TC\)$/ AND "transaction" !~ /^.+?SLA.*$/ AND "transaction" !~ /^.+?Запрос-выписки-за-день-всего.*$/ AND "transaction" !~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction")
list.name: request
list.query: select distinct("transaction") FROM (SELECT first("count") FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE  "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all' AND "transaction" !~ /^.+\(TC\)$/ AND "transaction" !~ /^.+?SLA.*$/ AND "transaction" !~ /^.+?Запрос-выписки-за-день-всего.*$/ AND "transaction" !~ /^${main_transaction:regex}$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction")

list.definition: select distinct("generatorHost") FROM (SELECT first("count") FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE  "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "generatorHost")
list.label: generator
list.name: generator
list.query: select distinct("generatorHost") FROM (SELECT first("count") FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE  "application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "generatorHost")

list.label: responce code
list.name: responce_code
list.query: select distinct("responseCode") FROM (SELECT first("count") FROM /^$measurement_name$/ WHERE ("application" =~ /^${application:regex}$/  AND "responseCode" != '0'  AND "responseCode" != '' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "responseCode")

title: INFLUX JMeter DASHBOARD
